nodes.text: Gadje was a beverage served at the Dead Aeronaut cantina on the Core Worlds planet Corellia. When Corellian Engineering Corporation employee Monti Calay visited the cantina around 34 ABY, he spotted a number of patrons who were regulars of the bar downing a watered-down variant of gadje.
Gadje appeared in Resistance Reborn, a 2019 novel written by Rebecca Roanhorse.
